survey_name: Remote Team Collaboration Tools Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees on the effectiveness and usability of collaboration tools used in remote work environments.

questions.question_text: Which collaboration tools do you currently use for remote work?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional tools not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which collaboration tools do you currently use for remote work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the collaboration tools you currently use?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the collaboration tools you currently use?

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when using collaboration tools for remote work?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather detailed feedback on challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with a text box for responses.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when using collaboration tools for remote work?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with your collaboration tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale for measuring frequency of technical issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with your collaboration tools?

questions.question_text: What features would you like to see added or improved in the collaboration tools you use?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to gather suggestions for improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT with a text box for responses.
